articles.author: Malay Mail
articles.title: Mavcom says air travel consumers not creditors, wants AirAsia X to reimburse customers for tickets purchased - Malay Mail
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR, Nov 12 — The Malaysian Aviation Commission (Mavcom) said it “has clearly and unequivocally urged AirAsia X Bhd (AAX) to reassess its proposal to treat air travel consumers as creditors and to pay only 0.5 per cent of the value of tickets purchas…
articles.content:
Tail of AirAsia X plane as seen at the Garuda Maintenance Facility AeroAsia in Tangerang, Indonesia, September 20, 2017. Reuters pic

articles.title: Vivian Lai's husband and ex Pokka CEO Alain Ong charged with disclosure offences, together with former Kimly directors - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - Two former directors of Kimly were charged on Friday (Nov 12) with disclosure offences related to the listed coffee shop operator's acquisition of drinks manufacturer Asian Story Corporation (ASC) in 2018. Kimly's former executive chairman Lim Hee…
